name: No One Dies - Black tile adventure
name_original: No One Dies - Black tile adventure
description:
It's simple. Just tap the white area to make the black tile jump over the obstacles. Keep all black tiles alive.

It's challengeable . 4 different levels to conquer. No one can run more than 10 meters in the last level.

It's addictive. Once you start, you can't stop playing. Think twice before you download the game!

It supports worldwide leaderboard. Play and see what's your rank against your friends or all other players.

Tips:Want to improve your score？You just need one movement. You don't know how? Contact me.
